00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00060     public sealed class ExponentialDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00061     {
00062         double _rate;
00063         double _helper1;
00064 
00065         #region Construction
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070         public
00071         ExponentialDistribution()
00072             : base()
00073         {
00074             SetDistributionParameters(1.0);
00075         }
00076 
00085         public
00086         ExponentialDistribution(
00087             RandomSource random
00088             )
00089             : base(random)
00090         {
00091             SetDistributionParameters(1.0);
00092         }
00093 
00098         public
00099         ExponentialDistribution(
00100             double rate
00101             )
00102             : base()
00103         {
00104             SetDistributionParameters(rate);
00105         }
00106         #endregion
00107 
00108         #region Distribution Parameters
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112         public double Rate
00113         {
00114             get { return _rate; }
00115             set { SetDistributionParameters(value); }
00116         }
00117 
00121         public
00122         void
00123         SetDistributionParameters(
00124             double rate
00125             )
00126         {
00127             if(!IsValidParameterSet(rate))
00128             {
00129                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid, "rate");
00130             }
00131 
00132             _rate = rate;
00133             _helper1 = -1.0 / rate;
00134         }
00135 
00142         public static
00143         bool
00144         IsValidParameterSet(
00145             double rate
00146             )
00147         {
00148             return rate > 0.0;
00149         }
00150         #endregion
00151 
00152         #region Distribution Properties
00153 
00154 
00155 
00156         public override double Minimum
00157         {
00158             get { return 0.0; }
00159         }
00160 
00164         public override double Maximum
00165         {
00166             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00167         }
00168 
00172         public override double Mean
00173         {
00174             get { return -_helper1; }
00175         }
00176 
00180         public override double Median
00181         {
00182             get { return -Math.Log(2.0) * _helper1; }
00183         }
00184 
00188         public override double Variance
00189         {
00190             get { return _helper1 * _helper1; }
00191         }
00192 
00196         public override double Skewness
00197         {
00198             get { return 2.0; }
00199         }
00200 
00204         public override
00205         double
00206         ProbabilityDensity(
00207             double x
00208             )
00209         {
00210             return _rate * Math.Exp(-_rate * x);
00211         }
00212 
00216         public override
00217         double
00218         CumulativeDistribution(
00219             double x
00220             )
00221         {
00222             return 1.0 - Math.Exp(-_rate * x);
00223         }
00224         #endregion
00225 
00226         #region Generator
00227 
00228 
00229 
00230 
00231         public override
00232         double
00233         NextDouble()
00234         {
00235             // Subtract random number from 1.0 to avoid Math.Log(0.0)
00236             return _helper1 * Math.Log(1.0 - this.RandomSource.NextDouble());
00237         }
00238         #endregion
00239     }
00240 }
